description:
You will love this beautiful one bedroom apartment with lots of lights, comfy full-sized bed in a very private setting. You will have  the kitchen, bathroom and the one bedroom all to yourself. 

Amenities: 
-Few steps away from supermarket, pharmacies, restaurants(Bakeries, Italian, Chinese, Oyster bar, etc), laundromat, etc..
-SAFE and Peaceful neighborhood
-Close to public transportation ( N train/ 30 minutes to the city)
-
name: Cozy Convenient Private One Bedroom Apartment
review: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
